entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023
